Rulings.Goat:
● Can you attack with a “Zoa” equipped with “Metalmorp 01/8/2004h” and then offer it to Special Summon “Metalzoa” during the Battle Phase to attack with the newly summoned monster? 
A: You can only perform that Special Summon during MP 1 or 2 of your turn only.
